channel.title: MoparScape Questions Section
channel.description:
I think that board needs to be renamed. It is a board for questions regarding the MoparScape forums and the webclient. There is no reason the board should look the way it is with all of the locked topics filling 90% of the pages of that section. I'm not by any means saying delete the board, I'm just saying change the title to make it more clarifying so these topics will decrease or stop all together.
Possibly change the Overall title to "Forum and Webclient questions" or something, and the sub-title to "Forum questions and MoparScape Webclient questions *ONLY*!" It's just an overall thought, give me your opinions on this.

item.title: MoparScape Questions Section
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:17, topic:181746”]If you really want people to see it, name it ‘GET YOUR HELP HERE NOW!’ and they will come skipping away. But anyway, since we are doing so many board modifications, MOPAR CAN YOU PLEESE INSTALL THIS MOD:

http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=38

I and a few others have been asking for the longest time =(. Pleeeese…[/quote]Doesn’t work
I’ve tested it in the Moparscape Questions section with a few titles.
“Free RS sources”, “All your help here”, “The best server sources here” and “READ THIS OR RECEIVE A LOCK”.
They didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Questions Section
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Sure you’ve merged two sections together, but not necessarily the entire section. The MoparScape Questions section if for server status, forum, and webclient issues and general questions about these.

I 100% agree with the factor of removing the Aryan section, but I think another section should go as well. That is the advertisements section. It is just two main stickies and posts, and the “Using the Server Status page” topic can be moved to another section where it can stay locked. It should be moved to the section where the general MoparScape Questions will go.

Yes, I also agree with the fact that only a few development teams are actually finished, which the idea of removing them is lingering in the air (except Rune Emu of course :P). I think that if anyone really wants to deal with the development team factor, it can be discussed later (in my opinion). Below I have listed the sections that I think should stay.

RS2 Server & Client Help - Most client questions are here anyways, there is really no other spot for them; and I really don’t like the fact of them being put into the Client Hacking section because Pwnd made that against the rules before, and it may confuse people and some flaming may occur against the moderators who locked question topics in the section.

RS2 Server & Client Downloads - Keep this section the same, it just really doesn’t say client downloads are allowed when they are posted anyways.

RS2 Server Tutorials - As well, keep this the same. There is nothing really wrong with this.

RSC Server Development - I see no problem with this section other than it’s sometimes the key flame area.

Webclient/Forum/Server Status Questions - The MoparScape Questions section currently, the current stickies are fine, this can just be utilized for the things it should be rather than server questions-basically the general purpose of the thread.

RS2 Client Hacking - The same client hacking section, just make it very clear that people are not by any means allowed to post questions there, but tutorials are welcome.

Post your thoughts, I just posted my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Questions Section
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

That sounds like a good Idea, Just having one board for help with anything to do with runescape private servers/clients and having a few mods (Not just the current section mods) but just other users with just moderator status in that one section 5 or so much like Taharok said.

It might make it more clear to users where to post, what i think we should have is:

Rs2 Server & Client Help
[size=7pt]Moderator: Tom, Dick, Harry[/size]
Rs2 Server Downloads
Rs2 Server Tutorials
RSC Server Development
RS Private Server Client Hacking

Then we have pretty much merged two sections together (Moparscape questions and Rs2 Server help/development) and got rid of one other the Aryan section which should of gone long ago since its been un-used since forever. Now you may ask ‘What about the developments’, now ask yourself have you seen more than 2/3 successful ones? No. But if you still think there should be these development teams on the forum what i suggest is that people should PM their plans or what they are going to post first to a moderator to approve them to be posted in the ‘Rs2 Server & Client help’ section. This may be a lot of work at first but if there is a sticky in that section about what will be accepted and denied and after people start realizing they can’t get away with what they used to they will probably give up and with newcomers not knowing any different you wont be getting any trouble off them

This may sound ambitious and there is obviously some problems in it but i think it could work with some tweaks

Read full topic

Just make one board with the word ‘help’ in it and assign five moderators to manage just that board. There, peace on the mscp forums.
